xyz.cofe.unix.linux

Interface Status

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    StatusImpl

    public interface Status
    Информация о статусе проекта
    Author:
    Kamnev Georgiy

      Virtual memory size
      long getVmStk()
      Size of stack segments.
      long getVmSwap()
      Swapped-out virtual memory size by anonymous private pages; shmem swap usage is not included (since Linux 2.6.34).
      long getVoluntaryCtxtSwitches()
      Number of voluntary and involuntary context switches (since Linux 2.6.23).

      • getNspgid

        int getNspgid()
        Process group ID in each of the PID namespaces of which [pid] is a member. The fields are ordered as for NStgid. (Since Linux 4.1.)
        Returns:

      • getNspid

        int getNspid()
        Thread ID in each of the PID namespaces of which [pid] is a member. The fields are ordered as for NStgid. (Since Linux 4.1.)
        Returns:

      • getNssid

        int getNssid()
        descendant namespace session ID hierarchy Session ID in each of the PID namespaces of which [pid] is a member. The fields are ordered as for NStgid. (Since Linux 4.1.)
        Returns:

      • getNstgid

        int getNstgid()
        Thread group ID (i.e., PID) in each of the PID namespaces of which [pid] is a member.

        The leftmost entry shows the value with respect to the PID namespace of the reading process, followed by the value in successively nested inner namespaces. (Since Linux 4.1.)

        Returns:

      • getPID

        Thread ID (see gettid(2))
        Returns:

        PID of parent process

        Size of resident anonymous memory. (since Linux 4.5).
        Returns:

      • getRssFile

        long getRssFile()
        Size of resident file mappings. (since Linux 4.5).
        Returns:

      • getRssShmem

        long getRssShmem()
        Size of resident shared memory (includes System V shared memory, mappings from tmpfs(5), and shared anonymous mappings). (since Linux 4.5).
        Returns:

      • getSavedGid

        int getSavedGid()

      • getSavedUid

      • getState

        Process.State getState()

      • getStateRaw

        String getStateRaw()
        Current state of the process. One of
        • "R (running)",
        • "S (sleeping)",
        • "D (disk sleep)",
        • "T (stopped)",
        • "T (tracing stop)",
        • "Z (zombie)",
        • or "X (dead)".
        Returns:
        Current state

      • getTgid

        int getTgid()
        Thread group ID (i.e., Process ID)
        Returns:

        long getThreads()
        Number of threads in process containing this thread.
        Returns:

      • getVmPeak

        long getVmPeak()
        Peak virtual memory size
        Returns:

      • getVmPin

        long getVmPin()
        Pinned memory size (since Linux 3.2). These are pages that can't be moved because something needs to directly access physical memory.
        Returns:

      • getVmRSS

        long getVmRSS()
        Resident set size. Note that the value here is the sum of RssAnon, RssFile, and RssShmem.
        Returns:

      • getVmSize

        long getVmSize()
        Virtual memory size
        Returns:

      • getVmStk

        long getVmStk()
        Size of stack segments.
        Returns:

      • getVmSwap

        long getVmSwap()
        Swapped-out virtual memory size by anonymous private pages; shmem swap usage is not included (since Linux 2.6.34).
        Returns:

      • getVoluntaryCtxtSwitches

        long getVoluntaryCtxtSwitches()
        Number of voluntary and involuntary context switches (since Linux 2.6.23).
        Returns:
